dc_title_s: Map of the city of Detroit, Michigan / drawn and published by William Sauer.
dc_description_s: City street map of Detroit and portions of Hamtramck, Highland Park, and Windsor. Shows streetcar lines and ward boundaries. Oriented with north to the upper right (north arrow not shown). "Copyright 1915 by Wm. Sauer." Includes street index and numbered list of streetcar lines ("car lines"). Scale not given.
